com.neovisionaries.android.core
クラス App

java.lang.Object
  com.neovisionaries.android.core.App

public class App
extends Object

A class to manage global information of the application. init(Context) method must be called before use.

作成者:
Takahiko Kawasaki

メソッドの詳細

init

public static App init(android.content.Context context)
Initialize this class. This static method must be called before use of getInstance() method. Otherwise, getInstance() will throw IllegalStateException.

It is recommended to call this static method in an implementation of onCreate() method of a subclass of Application. In the case, the subclass should be specified as the value of android:name attribute of application tag in AndroidManifest.xml. The easiest way to do it is to use BaseApplication class whose onCreate() method calls App.init(this).

In particular, items below are performed.

  • Set "java.net.preferIPv4Stack" to true if the system property is not set, and set "java.net.preferIPv6Addresses" to false if the system property is not set. These are done as a workaround against Issue 9431. Without this workaround, "java.net.SocketException: Bad address family" would be thrown on a device which does not support IPv6.

パラメータ:
context - The application context.
戻り値:
A newly created instance of App that has been initialized with the given context. getInstance() will return the same instance.
例外:
IllegalArgumentException - The argument is null.

getInstance

public static App getInstance()
Get the singleton instance of this class. init(Context) method must be called before use of this method. Otherwise, IllegalStateException is thrown.

戻り値:
The singleton instance of this class.

getContext

public android.content.Context getContext()
Get the application context.

戻り値:
The object passed to init(Context) is returned.

getApplicationLabel

public String getApplicationLabel()
Get the application label of this application.

戻り値:
The value returned from PackageManager.getApplicationLabel().

getVersionName

public String getVersionName()
Get the version name of this application.

戻り値:
The value of PackageInfo.versionName.

getPreferences

public Preferences getPreferences()
Get the Preferences instance that is supposed to be used globally for this application.

戻り値:
A Preferences instance which holds a private (MODE_PRIVATE) SharedPreferences instance which has been initialized with the application context passed to init(Context) method and the application name as the SharedPreferences instance's name.

getLocale

public Locale getLocale()
Get the current locale.

getLanguage

public String getLanguage()
Get the current language.

戻り値:
An alpha-2 code defined ISO-639.
関連項目:
ISO 639 Language Code List

getCountry

public String getCountry()
Get the current country.

戻り値:
An uppercase ISO 3166 2-letter code.
関連項目:
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Country Code List

isStopping

public boolean isStopping()
Check whether this application is in the process of termination.

setStopping

public void setStopping(boolean stopping)
Set the termination state of this application.
